attributes.description: Vehicle come with balance of the 4yr / 60 000km factory service plan and balance of the 4yr / 120 000km factory warranty. NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
